kv3.6:3.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, atthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:3.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:3.5: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, atthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:3.7: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:4.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi somanassaṁ, atthi somanassindriyaṁ, atthi jīvitaṁ, atthi jīvitindriyanti?
kv3.6:4.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:4.5: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi jīvitaṁ, atthi jīvitindriyanti?
kv3.6:5.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:5.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, natthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:6.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:6.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi somanassaṁ, natthi somanassindriyanti …pe… atthi jīvitaṁ, natthi jīvitindriyanti?
kv3.6:6.5: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:6.7: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, natthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:8.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, sā ca saddhā niyyānikāti?
kv3.6:8.3: Hañci aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, sā ca saddhā niyyānikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.6:8.5: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi vīriyaṁ, tañca vīriyaṁ niyyānikaṁ;
kv3.6:8.6: atthi sati, sā ca sati niyyānikā;
kv3.6:8.7: atthi samādhi, so ca samādhi niyyāniko;
kv3.6:8.8: atthi paññā, sā ca paññā niyyānikāti?
kv3.6:8.10: Hañci aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, sā ca paññā niyyānikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.6:9.1: ☑ Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:9.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:9.5: sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:9.7: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:10.2: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyaṁ …pe…
kv3.6:10.5: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:11.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:11.3: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:11.5: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:11.7: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:12.1: ☑ Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti …pe…
kv3.6:12.5: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:13.8: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samattā paripūrattā arahā hoti.
kv3.6:13.9: Tato mudutarehi arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi anāgāmī hoti, tato mudutarehi anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sakadāgāmī hoti, tato mudutarehi sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sotāpanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti.
kv3.6:13.10: Yassa kho, bhikkhave, imāni pañcindriyāni sabbena sabbaṁ sabbathā sabbaṁ natthi, tamahaṁ ‘bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe ṭhito’ti vadāmī”ti.
kv3.6:13.15: tena hi aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi pañcindriyānīti.
